description:
The Nextcloud Desktop Client is a tool to synchronize files from Nextcloud Server with your computer.

Use the desktop clients to keep your files synchronized between your Nextcloud server and your desktop.
Select one or more directories on your local machine and always have access to your latest files wherever you are.
What's Changed
- feat(mac-crafter): Added time measurement of build phases to improve on. by @i2h3 in nextcloud/desktop#8500
- fix(logger): Set narrower permissions on temporaryFolderLogDirPath by @joshtrichards in nextcloud/desktop#6533
- fix(db): optimize SQL qeury for updating encryption status by @mgallien in nextcloud/desktop#8506
- File Provider Localization by @i2h3 in nextcloud/desktop#8507
- fix(discovery): check for db cached folder quota during discovery for some items. by @camilasan in nextcloud/desktop#8307
- Extended logged information about file provider domains. by @i2h3 in nextcloud/desktop#8503
- Additional Localizations in macOS File Provider by @i2h3 in nextcloud/desktop#8514
- Added Package.resolved of NextcloudIntegration project to version control. by @i2h3 in nextcloud/desktop#8504
- Do not strip get-task-allow entitlement of developer build extensions by @i2h3 in nextcloud/desktop#8501
- feat: checks Qt managed translations for tripple dots instead of elipsis by @mgallien in nextcloud/desktop#8522
- fix(wizard): show VFS option during account setup when using a mac-VFS build by @nilsding in nextcloud/desktop#8515
- Enable Log Output in Xcode Console by @i2h3 in nextcloud/desktop#8497
- fix(l10n): Don't sync xcstrings for now by @nickvergessen in nextcloud/desktop#8527
- Add proper translations for macOS File Provider extensions by @Copilot in nextcloud/desktop#8531
- chore: remove useless "else if" by @nilsding in nextcloud/desktop#8533
- fix: catch exceptions when using std::filesystem APIs by @mgallien in nextcloud/desktop#8525
